title: Bug 102516: JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand
description: Bug 102516: JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand. The JDBC Data Set Editor page for a SQL Query has a tree control that lists the tables and columns in your data source.
OB: Currently, the JDBC Data Set Editor loads all tables and columns in the data source when the page is opened.
EB: The JDBC Data Set Editor should only load tables and columns when the user expands the tree or applies a filter.
SR:
To reproduce:  
1. Open the JDBC Data Set Editor for a SQL Query.  
2. Observe that all tables and columns are loaded and displayed in the tree control.  
3. Expand the tree or apply a filter.  
4. Verify that the tables and columns are loaded on demand and dynamically displayed based on user actions.
